bug.author: AlexDBlack
bug.description:
As noted here: I'm seeing some character encoding issues for the internationalization (non-english languages) in the UI when run via deeplearning4j-ui-standalone. The actual internationalization text files (in the jar) seems to be correct/OK. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/pull/4508#issuecomment-357895004>https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/pull/4508#issuecomment-357895004</denchmark-link>
Also need to confirm if this does/doesn't happen with the UI for user-generated uber JARs.

comments.comment:
Fixed here, will be merged soon: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/pull/4714>https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/pull/4714</denchmark-link>
Before: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2360237/36658376-60c21486-1b24-11e8-97b1-d6972c882e83.png></denchmark-link>
After: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2360237/36658663-bc9318cc-1b25-11e8-9d86-ac4621b565f5.png></denchmark-link>
This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
